05/05/2023
Dear Sir,

I think you should consider a thorough reworking of your DMP because the information in it seems to be incomplete and sometimes a bit confusing. I've added a number of comments to the version in attachment.
Maybe we could organize a meeting, online of live, to discuss your DMP?

Best regards,

Mark

mark.verbrugge@kuleuven.be

05/04/2023
BOF expects a more detailed DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find this template in DMPonline.be by selecting that there is no funder associated with your project when creating the DMP. Consult https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/funder for more information about the funder requirements, and https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp for guidance on how to write a DMP
